summary: Worked on building the new testnet web application from scratch having more than 100 users interacting on a daily basis.
Implemented the Redux toolkit to centralize the comprehensive numbers of states at one place which increased the speed upto 130%.
Worked on adding features and optimizing the existing mainnet web application.
Used routing for each nav buttons by using next.js file based routing
